tileType.name: Soft button
tileType.description: Soft button. Activated when any part of the block presses it.

tileType.name: Hard button
tileType.description: Hard button. Activated only when the block standing on it.

tileType.name: Teleporter
tileType.description: Teleporter will teleports your block to different locations, optionally splitting it into two smaller blocks at the same time.

tileType.name: Thin ground
tileType.description: Thin ground are more fragile than the rest of the land. If your block stands up vertically on it, the tile will give way and your block will fall.

tileType.name: Bridge
tileType.description: The bridge is just the same as normal ground when it is activated.

tileType.name: Goal
tileType.description: You'll win the game if you get your block to fall into this square hole after visiting all checkpoints.

tileType.name: Ice
tileType.description: Ice are slippery. If the block is not rough enough and is completely on the ice, it will slip until get off the ice or hit the wall.

tileType.name: Pyramid
tileType.description: Your block is unstable when standing on the pyramid, so it will lie down immediately unless there is a wall next to your block.

tileType.name: Wall
tileType.description: As an obstacle, your block can't pass through the wall, but it can recline on the wall and move around.

tileType.name: Very thin ground
tileType.description: This ground is so thin that it will break down immediately after you move on it.

tileType.name: Tricky ground
tileType.description: After you stand on a tricky ground, it will turn to thin ground.

tileType.name: Strange ground
tileType.description: The block can move onto a strange ground, but only if it stands upright on it.

tileType.name: Black ground
tileType.description: Only black block can pass through black ground.

tileType.name: White ground
tileType.description: Only white block can pass through white ground.

tileType.name: Color-undefined ground
tileType.description: Same as normal ground, but it will change to the block's color if a black or white block is leave it.

tileType.name: Color-inverse ground
tileType.description: Same as normal ground, but it will change to the color opposite to the block's color if a black or white block is leave it.
